subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul is, in the estimation of many, the best point guard in the N.B.A., but, at heart, he is still looking for a seat at the grown-ups’ table.
snippet: Los Angeles Clippers point guard Chris Paul is, in the estimation of many, the best point guard in the N.B.A., but, at heart, he is still looking for a seat at the grown-ups’ table.
